name: Curb Ball Game
description:
Curbball Mobile game is the first of its kind. This version is an endless demo so the user can get familiar with the mechanics of the game. If you're not familiar with the concept of the real life game, it’s a basic 2x player game. Each player stands on the opposite sides of the street. One player will throw the ball across the street to attempt to hit the curb while trying not to hit a car or you lose all your points.

HOW TO PLAY
•Press/ hold finger down on screen to control green arrow.
•Line arrow up against the curb & let go!

New Features coming soon:
• New levels
• Ability to select more balls
• Multiplayer
Plus many more!
